name: Frenzy Fruits Toy Match - Super blast 3 heroes
name_original: Frenzy Fruits Toy Match - Super blast 3 heroes
description:
Match juicy combinations of fruits before they overflow in your new match-3 adventure: Frenzy Fruits!

Features:
- Addictive Match 3 gameplay with a twist
- Lots of fun & challenging levels to complete
- Magic potions & Fruit transformations to make great combos
- Beautiful Retina Graphics
- Great Music and Sound Effects
- 3 Difficulty settings
- Close any time and resume later

Great time killer for puzzle lovers!

More info at www.boviosoft.com
